# MCP-Go

> A Go implementation of the Model Context Protocol (MCP), enabling seamless integration between LLM applications and external data sources and tools.

## Docs

- [Example](/example): This is an example page.
- [Getting Started](/getting-started): MCP-Go makes it easy to build Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers in Go. This guide will help you create your first MCP server in just a few minutes.
